definition[0]: not very great in amount, number, ability etc
example[0]: My knowledge of the business is limited.
example[1]: The organization has very limited resources.
example[2]: So far, the education reforms have had only limited success.
example[3]: There are only a limited number of tickets available.
example[4]: Unfortunately, the drug is of limited value in treating cancer.
definition[1]: used after the name of British business companies that have limited liability
definition[2]: used after the name of a company to show that it is a LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY
example[5]: Perkins Slade Limited, a highly regarded insurance broking business
